creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Belgian edition; woman on the left in a yellow gown with fur collar and cuffs, a walking stick, and a yellow hat with purple ribbon; man on right in black breeches and black hat and a blue coat; the figures in this plate are similar to two separate plates found in the French edition of this periodical (P.15,175-P.15,177)
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Onzième Cahier, 28 Février 1787
